Name: Magnolia
Description: A popular spring flower that has inspired many an artist.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Una flor popular en primavera que ha inspirado a muchos artistas.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 많은 예술가들에게 영감을 준 인기 있는 봄꽃.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Eine beliebte Frühlingsblume, die schon viele Künstler inspiriert hat.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Uma flor popular da primavera que inspirou muitos artistas.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 一种颇受欢迎的春花，给予艺术家们许多灵感。
